item.title: Four #OpenStreetMap projects are taking part in Google's Summer of Code this year. üôÇ Read more on: OSM Wiki: üìù https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Google_Summer_of_Code/2024/Accepted_projects OSM Forum üí¨ https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/four-projects-accepted-for-google-summer-of-code-2024/112588 #GSoC #GoogleSummerOfCode #SummerOfCode #OSM

NINE DAYS LEFT to submit to the OSM Science 2024 track in Nairobi this autumn. The deadline is 10 May 2024. Submit here: https://pretalx.com/state-of-the-map-2024-academic-track/cfp Learn more here: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/04/04/sotm-2024-call-for-academic-track-abstracts/ @sotm #SotM #StateOfTheMap #OpenStreetMap

Today, 1 May, is International Workers' Day! üåπ Your local trade union can be mapped in #OpenStreetMap with `office=union`: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tag:office%3Dunion. The OpenStreetMap project strives to make the best, freely licenced map of the world for everyone, available for free. We provide the alternative to the handful of massive global corporations. #OSMF is the democratic org supporting #OSM. Join today: https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/#Membership-Categories #OSMFMembershipCampaign #LabourDay #InternationalWorkersDay
üìç New OSM blog post: THREE reasons to join the OpenStreetMap foundation in April: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/04/11/three-great-reasons-to-join-the-osm-foundation-as-a-member/

Today's the UNESCO #WorldBookDay! #OpenStreetMap can help you find books. We map libraries <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tag:amenity%3Dlibrary> (incl. little free libraries <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tag:amenity%3Dpublic_bookcase>), and bookshops <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tag:shop%3Dbooks>. Several books have been published about #OSM: <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Books> We want OSM to be used, so if you need a map for your book, we have very generous & liberal attribution requirements: https://osmfoundation.org/wiki/Licence/Attribution_Guidelines (and can show where to buy your stationary https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tag:shop%3Dstationery )
‚è∞ Today is the last day to apply to present at #StateOfTheMap (@sotm), the annual #OpenStreetMap global conference, in Nairobi, Kenya! https://2024.stateofthemap.org/calls/general/ #OSM #sotm2024

Would you like to see your post, project, mapping party, community photo, diary, mapping data viz or other #OSM story on the official OSM social media channels? Here are some guidelines for requesting Communications Working Group support: https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/update-on-how-to-request-social-media-posts-or-other-cwg-support/111482 #OpenStreetMap

üì¨ You've got mail! Germany's national postal service (Deutsche Post/DHL) has switched to OpenStreetMap for their public facing websites, https://deutschepost.de, https://dhl.de. üéâü•≥üéäüéÅ #SwitchToOpenStreetMap #OpenStreetMap #OSM

OpenStreetMap.org is retiring OAuth 1.0a and HTTP Basic Auth on June 1st 2024. Are you developing software that uses one of these authentication methods to log in to the #openstreetmap website? Here's some guidance to help you switch to OAuth 2.0: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/04/17/oauth-1-0a-and-http-basic-auth-shutdown-on-openstreetmap-org/

üí° Suggest topics to be discussed at OSMF board strategy meeting ü§ù The OpenStreetMap Foundation Board will meet in person in April. The Board will be holding discussions on a range of topics to do with the current and future operations of the Board, and invites the members of the Foundation to suggest topics that you think are important and that should be discussed, resolved or advanced in some way. üí¨ Feeback form ‚Üí <https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/suggest-topics-to-be-discussed-at-osmf-board-strategy-meeting/111742>

Only 1 week left to apply to present at #StateOfTheMap (@sotm), the annual #OpenStreetMap global conference, in Nairobi, Kenya.The Call for Participation is open until 2024-04-23 https://2024.stateofthemap.org/calls/general/ #OSM #sotm2024

There are 12,000 people following this account ü•≥ , but only ~2,000 people are members of the OpenStreetMap Foundation üòî . Take your #OSM support to the next level by becoming a member of the OpenStreetMap Foundation today! üöÄ <https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/#Membership-Categories> It's even available for free üòç if you've ‚Äúconsistently made sizeable contributions to OpenStreetMap‚Äù (explain in the application, or edit OSM for 42+ days in the last yr.) #OpenStreetMap #OSMFoundation #OSMFMembershipCampaign

The OSMF is hosting a webinar / panel discussion touching on OSMF membership overview, experiences, challenges and opportunities on 13 April. Sign up here: https://us06web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZ0qc--vrTspGt1scDZIXxLAhDRacI4j7noY#/registration #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMFMembershipCampaign #OSMFoundation #OSMF

Eid Mubarak! #OpenStreetMap is making a map of all the things in the world. You can help and map things like Mosques <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Mosque>, Islamic places of worship <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tag:religion%3Dmuslim>, or the availability of #Halal food <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Key:diet:halal> #musilim #islam #eid #eidmubarak #ramadan

The next #OSMF General Meeting and board election is on 19 Oct. 2024. If you want to run for the Board, you must be a member by 22 Apr. 2024. There will be 4 Board positions open. If you're not sure that you want to run for the Board, but you think you MIGHT be interested, you should join! Join OSM here: https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/#Membership-Categories #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMFoundation #OSMFMembershipCampaign

#SotM2024: Call for Academic Track Abstracts! This year‚Äôs State of the Map conference will feature OSM Science 2024, the 7th edition of the Academic Track of State of the Map ‚Äì a full day of sessions dedicated to academic research about, and with, OpenStreetMap. Authors are invited to submit abstracts (800-1200 words in plain text, without figures) using the OSM Science 2024 Pretalx submission system by 10 May 2024 https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/04/04/sotm-2024-call-for-academic-track-abstracts/ @sotm #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMScience #OpenScience

another highlight from WeeklyOSM #714 OSM user SeverinGeo advocated for introducing new contributors to OpenStreetMap through field mapping in this diary entry, https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/SeverinGeo/diary/403778, listing many reasons why the field mapping approach is a good one. "

Some highlights from weeklyOSM 714 Katja Haferkorn¬†reported¬†on the 21st FOSSGIS conference, which was held from 20 to 23 March in Hamburg. (Das war die FOSSGIS 2024 in Hamburg ‚Äì FOSSGIS ) image credit: Group photo participants FOSSGIS 2024 Hamburg [1] | ¬© FOSSGIS ‚Äì CC-BY-SA

üì£ Calling OSM Brazil! On 2 Apr, at 7 pm (Bras√≠lia time), the Brazilian community will hold its monthly virtual meeting. Discussions will cover current and future projects. Details are here: https://buff.ly/4adjQ2B

Happy Trans* Day of Visibility! Trans people are mappers, and hackers, and cartographers, and have always been a part of the OpenStreetMap community. The OpenStreetMap project is creating a freely licenced map of the world, based on how things actually are, based on how they act, and appear, not based on what some government says. OSM is trans positive. #OpenStreetMap #OSM #TDoV #TransDayOfVisibility #Trans https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/w/images/thumb/2/2f/2019_v1_OSM_Logo_trans.svg/480px-2019_v1_OSM_Logo_trans.svg.png
